foreignData.name: Großzügige Magistratin
foreignData.text:
Die Großzügige Magistratin kommt mit fünf Galgenfristmarken ins Spiel.
Immer wenn eine andere Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, und falls ihr Manabetrag 1 oder mehr war, kannst du entsprechend viele Galgenfristmarken von der Großzügigen Magistratin entfernen. Falls du dies tust, bringe jene Karte unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.name: Magistrada magnánima
foreignData.text:
La Magistrada magnánima entra al campo de batalla con cinco contadores de prórroga sobre ella.
Siempre que otra criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, si su valor de maná era de 1 o más, puedes remover esa misma cantidad de contadores de prórroga de la Magistrada magnánima. Si lo haces, regresa esa carta al campo de batalla bajo el control de su propietario.

foreignData.name: Magistrate magnanime
foreignData.text:
La Magistrate magnanime arrive sur le champ de bataille avec cinq marqueurs « répit » sur elle.
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, si sa valeur de mana était supérieure ou égale à 1, vous pouvez retirer autant de marqueurs « répit » de la Magistrate magnanime. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez cette carte sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle de son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Magistrata Magnanima
foreignData.text:
La Magistrata Magnanima entra nel campo di battaglia con cinque segnalini clemenza.
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura non pedina che controlli muore, se il suo valore di mana era pari o superiore a 1, puoi rimuovere altrettanti segnalini clemenza dalla Magistrata Magnanima. Se lo fai, rimetti quella carta sul campo di battaglia sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignData.name: 寛大な判事
foreignData.text:
寛大な判事は猶予カウンター５個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでもこれでもないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、そのマナ総量が１以上であった場合、あなたはその数に等しい個数の猶予カウンターを寛大な判事の上から取り除いてもよい。そうしたなら、そのカードをオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・アドバイザー

foreignData.name: 宽宏执政官
foreignData.text:
宽宏执政官进战场时上面有五个免难指示物。
每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，若它的法术力值等于或大于1，则你可以从宽宏执政官上移去等量的免难指示物。若你如此作，则将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

mainBoard.name: Magnanimous Magistrate
mainBoard.originalText:
Magnanimous Magistrate enters the battlefield with five reprieve counters on it.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, if its mana value was 1 or greater, you may remove that many reprieve counters from Magnanimous Magistrate. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
mainBoard.text:
This creature enters with five reprieve counters on it.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, if its mana value was 1 or greater, you may remove that many reprieve counters from this creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainBoard.flavorText: The hound sniffed the air and let slip a low growl. General Takeno looked down at the faithful Isamaru and calmed him with a touch. "Alert the guard. The kami are coming."

foreignData.flavorText:
Der Hund schnüffelte in der Luft herum und knurrte leise. General Takeno betrachtete den treuen Isamaru und beruhigte ihn mit einer leichten Berührung.
„Alarmiert die Truppen. Die Kami kommen."
foreignData.name: Isamaru, Kondas Jagdhund

foreignData.flavorText: El mastín olisqueó el aire y lanzó un gruñido. El General Takeno miró al fiel Isamaru y lo calmó con palmadas. "Alerta a los hombres. Vienen los kami".

mainBoard.name: Michiko Konda, Truth Seeker
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.

rulings.text: One permanent is sacrificed each time an opponent’s source deals damage to Michiko Konda’s controller. The amount of damage doesn’t matter.
Sources that deal damage multiple times (such as creatures with double strike) will trigger Michiko Konda multiple times.

Spells that deal damage repeatedly trigger Michiko Konda’s ability each time they deal damage. For example, a Glacial Ray spliced onto another Glacial Ray triggers the ability twice (once for each “2 damage” event from the Glacial Ray).

mainBoard.text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent of their choice.

mainBoard.name: Ninth Bridge Patrol
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ninth Bridge Patrol.

rulings.text: If Ninth Bridge Patrol is dealt lethal damage at the same time as another creature you control, it won't receive a counter from its ability in time to save it.

Ninth Bridge Patrol's ability doesn't care where the creature went or whether it's a creature in its new zone. It may have died, been exiled, returned to your hand, and so on. It won't trigger if an object remains on the battlefield but ceases to be a creature. It won't trigger if a creature phases out.

mainBoard.text: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Quand la créature enchantée meurt, créez X jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Soldat, X étant sa force.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ogni morte porta una ragnatela di conseguenze. Il nostro lavoro è trovare il ragno."
foreignData.name: Indagine per Omicidio
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura che controlli
Quando la creatura incantata muore, crea X pedine creatura Soldato 1/1 bianche, dove X è la sua forza.

foreignData.flavorText: 「どんな死でも、その影響が蜘蛛の巣のように広がる。その蜘蛛を見つけるのが我々の仕事だ。」
foreignData.name: 殺人の捜査
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー）
エンチャントしているクリーチャーが死亡したとき、白の１/１の兵士・クリーチャー・トークンＸ体を生成する。Ｘはエンチャントしているクリーチャーのパワーに等しい。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.flavorText: 「每次死亡都像一张由后果结成的网。我们的职责就是找出结网的蜘蛛。」
foreignData.name: 调查谋杀
foreignData.text:
结附于由你操控的生物
当所结附的生物死去时，派出X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物，X为其力量。

mainBoard.name: Murder Investigation
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.

rulings.text: If another player gains control of either Murder Investigation or the enchanted creature (but not both), Murder Investigation will be enchanting an illegal permanent. The Aura will be put into its owner’s graveyard as a state-based action.
To determine how many Soldier tokens are created, use the power of the enchanted creature as it last existed on the battlefield.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.

foreignData.name: Bauwerk der Autorität
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht angreifen. Lege eine Ziegelmarke auf das Bauwerk der Autorität.
{1}, {T}: Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann eine Kreatur deiner Wahl nicht angreifen oder blocken und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls sich drei oder mehr Ziegelmarken auf dem Bauwerk der Autorität befinden.

foreignData.name: Edificio de autoridad
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: La criatura objetivo no puede atacar este turno. Pon un contador de bloque sobre el Edificio de autoridad.
{1}, {T}: Hasta tu próximo turno, la criatura objetivo no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse. Activa esto solo si hay tres o más contadores de bloque sobre el Edificio de autoridad.

foreignData.name: Édifice d'autorité
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T} : Une créature ciblée ne peut pas attaquer ce tour-ci. Mettez un marqueur « brique » sur l'Édifice d'autorité.
{1}, {T} : Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, une créature ciblée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées. N'activez que s'il y a au moins trois marqueurs « brique » sur l'Édifice d'autorité.

foreignData.name: Edificio dell'Autorità
foreignData.text:
{1}, {T}: Una creatura bersaglio non può attaccare in questo turno. Metti un segnalino mattone sull'Edificio dell'Autorità.
{1}, {T}: Fino al tuo prossimo turno, una creatura bersaglio non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate. Attiva solo se ci sono tre o più segnalini mattone sull'Edificio dell'Autorità.

foreignData.name: 権威の殿堂
foreignData.text:
{1},{T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それでは攻撃できない。権威の殿堂の上に石材カウンター１個を置く。
{1},{T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。次のあなたのターンまで、それでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。権威の殿堂の上に３個以上の石材カウンターがなければ起動できない。

foreignData.name: 威权高塔
foreignData.text:
{1}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能攻击。在威权高塔上放置一个石砖指示物。
{1}，{T}：直到你的下一个回合，目标生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。只能于威权高塔上有三个或更多石砖指示物时起动。

mainBoard.name: Edifice of Authority
mainBoard.originalText:
{1}, {T}: Target creature can't attack this turn. Put a brick counter on Edifice of Authority.
{1}, {T}: Until your next turn, target creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated. Activate only if there are three or more brick counters on Edifice of Authority.

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (starting with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) are unaffected by the last ability of Edifice of Authority. Notably, exerting a creature isn’t an activated ability.

Edifice of Authority can’t be used to undo an attack or block once it has been declared. Its abilities must be activated no later than the beginning of combat step to stop a creature from attacking, and no later than the declare attackers step to stop a creature from blocking.

Once a player has announced that they are activating the ability of a creature, Edifice of Authority can’t be used to undo it. Its last ability must be activated before the player activates that creature’s ability. The player may respond to Edifice of Authority’s ability with the target creature’s ability if able.

mainBoard.text:
{1}, {T}: Target creature can't attack this turn. Put a brick counter on this artifact.
{1}, {T}: Until your next turn, target creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated. Activate only if there are three or more brick counters on this artifact.

mainBoard.flavorText: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Blüte der Wildblumen richtet sich hier nicht nach den Jahreszeiten, sondern nach den Gezeiten der Magie.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Heide kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Heide ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Las flores salvajes de aquí no florecen según las estaciones, sino según los altibajos y el flujo de la magia.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Brezal floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Brezal floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Ici, les fleurs sauvages s'épanouissent non pas au gré des saisons mais au gré des flux de magie.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
La Prairie prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
Au moment où la Prairie prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I fiori selvatici qui non sbocciano in base alle stagioni, ma seguendo il fluire della magia.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
La Brughiera Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Brughiera Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 季節ではなく魔法の干満に従って野生の花が咲く。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
興隆する荒野はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する荒野が戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 驱使这片野花绽放的，并非季节更替，而是魔力起伏。
foreignData.name: 兴旺荒地
foreignData.text:
兴旺荒地须横置进战场。
于兴旺荒地进战场时，选择一种白色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{W}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
